pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
I have implemented the fixed joint and placed the arm in the correct relative position in the `model.sdf`. However, I have not been able to do the same using the `.urdf`. Also the bounding box is centered incorrectly for some reason. I will try to fix this

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2332760424-Post_with_fixed_joint.png)
content.html: I have implemented the fixed joint and placed the arm in the correct relative position in the model.sdf. However, I have not been able to do the same using the .urdf. Also the bounding box is centered incorrectly for some reason. I will try to fix this
